adr_address: 3 Rue Frochot, 75009 Paris, France

editorial_summary.overview: Bright rooms in a down-to-earth hotel featuring a bar with live music, plus free breakfast & Wi-Fi.

name: Accueil Hotel - Paris Pigalle Montmartre

reviews.text:
The property was in a good location. When we checked in, the staff asked us if we smoke, and gave us a balcony when we said that we do. That’s all from pluses unfortunetly.
There were some renovations going on in the cafe next doors, and you could hear everything from 9 am. The hotel is no soundproof at all. Breakfast is a scam. It is until 10am, at 9, there was literally no food. When we complained, we heard it's not there fault, because some guy didn't do the shopping. I don't care if someone didn't do their job- I payed for a breakfast, I expect it. Someone went to buy some croissants and baguettes, but it was all. Very bad breakfast.
Choose some other hotel, this one should not use „ibis” name.

We stayed here for 2 nights and everything was perfect. Room was a bit small but that is expected. Location was 10 out of 10, very close to the metro and a walking distance to Montmartre and even to a city centre. Staff was very lovely and helpful. Even thought it was surrounded by quite a few night club, we could have a peaceful sleep. Definitely coming back for our next stay in Paris.

Amazing, kind and helpful staff ATB this hotel. The receptionist Basyt and la femme de chambre Annick, were ai kind and helpful throughout our stay. This is a simple hotel with top notch service thanks to them.

Fantastic budget hotel.rooms were clean, beds comfortable. Staff where great, location was great, very close to the metro. It's a 3 star hotel so you get what you pay for, the rooms are small, but if you want a big room in Paris you will have to pay a lot for it. Very comfortable stay, ticked all the boxes, even the breakfast was pretty decent.
Avoid at all cost. The worst service and by far the rudest staff I have ever experienced! Such a shame stayed in many of these hotels but will never be back!! Reception 9pm 30/03/2025
